CreditMemo.name: CreditMemo
CreditMemo.description: Represents a document that is used to reduce the amount that a buyer owes a seller under the terms of an earlier invoice.

AppType.description: Read-only field that indicates which Salesforce application generated the credit memo.

Balance.description: Amount of the credit memo that's available for allocation.

BillToContactId.description: Inherited from the account’s Bill to Account field.

BillingAccountId.description: The customer account associated with this credit memo.

CreationMode.description: Indicates whether the credit memo originated in Salesforce or an external system.

CreditDate.description: The date when the credit memo was posted.

CreditMemoNumber.description: A credit memo numbering alternative to DocumentNumber, containing a number in a format of your choice. Credit memo numbering is optional.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code associated with the credit memo.

DocumentNumber.description: System-generated number for organizing financial documents, for example DOC-0000123.

EffectiveDate.description: Represents the effective date of the credit memo. If this field is empty, the credit date is used. For reporting purposes only; this field drives no other logic.

ExternalReference.description: Contains an external system’s ID for the credit memo.

ExternalReferenceDataSource.description: Contains the name of the external system that also contains the credit memo.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it's possible that this record was only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

NetCreditsApplied.description: Represents the total difference between the credit applied to and credit unapplied from the invoice.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns a credit memo record.

ReferenceEntityId.description: The ID of the record that this credit memo was generated from. For example, the order, order summary, or invoice.

SourceAction.description: Indicates which Salesforce API created the credit memo.

TotalAdjustmentAmount.description: Sum of TotalAmount values for the credit memo’s adjustment lines.

TotalAdjustmentAmountWithTax.description: The sum of the credit memo’s adjustment line amounts, including tax.

TotalAdjustmentTaxAmount.description: The sum of the credit memo’s adjustment line tax. Adjustment line balances are excluded.

TotalAmount.description: Sum of the credit memo’s TotalLineAmount and TotalAdjustmentAmount.

TotalAmountWithTax.description: Total credit memo amount, with tax included.

TotalChargeAmount.description: Sum of TotalAmount values for the credit memo’s charge lines.

TotalChargeAmountWithTax.description: The sum of the credit memo’s charge line amounts, including tax.

TotalChargeTaxAmount.description: This field is available in API version 49.0 and later.

TotalCreditAmountApplied.description: Credit memo amount that's been applied to invoices.

TotalCreditAmountUnapplied.description: Credit memo amount that's been unapplied from invoices.

TotalTaxAmount.description: Sum of TotalAmount values for the credit memo’s tax lines.
